And important piece of contacts that we need to remember is that President George W. Bush

Only they could show Hispanics that Republican conservative policies were going to help improve their lives than you know in the future they could wear away at the sort of democratic Obama coalition that had cost them two presidential elections already

Republican leaning Latino showed up at the same rate that they did in previous campaigns

Much more nuance than we understood before and they care about a lot more issues than they are being spoken to about
